@title SafeMath

@title Basic token
@dev Basic version of StandardToken, with no allowances.
nodes.name: BasicToken
transfer

StandardToken

approve
allowance
Ownable

nodes.documentation:
@dev The Ownable constructor sets the original `owner` of the contract to the sender
account.
nodes.name: Ownable

nodes.documentation: @dev Throws if called by any account other than the owner.
nodes.name: onlyOwner

nodes.documentation:
@dev Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.
@param newOwner The address to transfer ownership to.
nodes.name: transferOwnership
MintableToken
mint

nodes.documentation:
@dev Function to stop minting new tokens.
@return True if the operation was successful.
nodes.name: stopMinting

nodes.documentation:
@dev Function to start minting new tokens.
@return True if the operation was successful.
nodes.name: startMinting

nodes.documentation: HDL (Handelion) Token
nodes.name: HDLToken

nodes.documentation: Transfers token ownership from Pre-sale to Sale
nodes.name: TransferTokenOwnership

nodes.documentation:
Finishes PRE-ICO crowdsale and closes current contract.
Checks is goal is reached. If it is reached then withdraws all funds to vault address
Otherwise tries to refund investors or Opens contract for refunding.
nodes.name: finish

nodes.documentation:
Refunds investor. Should be called by investors.
If contract state is in Refunding state then returns to investor sent amount.
nodes.name: requestRefunding

nodes.documentation: Accepts ethers from investor and sends back HDL tokens.
nodes.name: buyTokens
